lead_paragraph: Zenit St Petersburg forward Hulk has joined Shanghai SIPG for a record 55.8 million Euros, the Russian club said on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Hulk Joins Shanghai SIPG in Record Deal
headline.main: Hulk Joins Shanghai SIPG in Record Deal

snippet: Zenit St Petersburg forward Hulk has joined Shanghai SIPG for a record 55.8 million Euros, the Russian club said on Thursday. ...
